attributes.additional_details: To look into the facts that so many people have had damaging effects from the Benzodiazepine drug group. GP's flouting prescription laws by prescribing for more than 4 weeks max, by prescribing another drug within the same group. Sleeping drugs such as Tamazepam triggering mental illness & psychosis by permanently rewiring the brain. Doctors to be made responsible & pay compensation to victims.
